website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a little more weight capacity and want to avoid rust, this product comes at a good price point.
pros: Can be filled with sand or water
Easy to assemble and fills easily
Roller is lightweight when not filled
Includes a center baffle bar for stability
cons: This roller is made to attach to the back of a lawn tractor
It does not have handles for hand pushing

customer_reviews.title: Agri-Fab Lawn Roller - Works Great
customer_reviews.text: What you see is what you get! The Agri-Fab lawn roller works very well! We use it after moles tore up our yard! Packs the dirt down really well! The barrel part is made of a heavy thick rubber/plastic! The bars are made of a metal & steel! You can fill it with sand or water, I would recommend water in case you have to load it up and take it somewhere - it whole lot easier to get water out then sand!
customer_reviews.author: WilliamTop Contributor: Country Music

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was on time and box was intact. Assembly instructions were vague as I didn't find any but there was a parts breakdown schematic and I used that for direction. Assembly was easy but for people not knowing any better, it could be difficult. I recall reading one review where the guy complained that the axle shaft wasn't drilled for the keepers, guess what, it's not supposed to be. I would recommend putting grease on the washers and bushings for the axle during assembly but other than that. It appears to be a good buy. I think that with care and occasional greasing and tightening of fasteners, it should provide many years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Buy some large washers for the shaft
customer_reviews.text: Well made. I like it. After first assembling and using I noticed the ridge around the plug was catching on the metal when I turned corners. I had to place several large washers on the shaft to keep it from doing that.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Aten

customer_reviews.title: It does what it's made to do.
customer_reviews.text: It's basically the first invention known to man. Lol. It was packaged well, assembly was easy and it appears to be made well. I have used it twice so far and no issues. No leaks, no bends nothing. It rolls my lawn. Like it says. Only thing I wish were different was the need for it to be triangulated. So becareful taking sharp turns or backing up while turning, your rear wheels will rub the bars a little. No big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Kindell

customer_reviews.title: first use resulted in damage!
customer_reviews.text: first use resulted in major cracking around the plastic casing. Very VERy disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Biltz

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Even Better Service!
customer_reviews.text: Roller arrived quickly and was easy to assemble AFTER watching on-line assembly video. I live in Arkansas where we're renowned for growing bumper crops of rocks in our yards. I was concerned that the roller might not survive rolling over the sharp edged rocks. I've been using the roller for about a month with no problem at all, it's extremely durable. Highly recommend. When the roller arrived, the scraper bar had a crack in one of the bends. I contacted Agri-Fab and spoke to Cindy. With zero hassle she had a new bar sent out and it arrived in two business days. Thanks to all. Highly recommend the product and the company.
customer_reviews.author: ChiefB

customer_reviews.title: Width is great as it matches the width of the lawn mower
customer_reviews.text: Width is great as it matches the width of the lawn mower. I am sure that the weight of a bigger diameter roller (bigger than 18") would be better for leveling. This roller is not heaver in terms of psi than the weight of the surface area of my lawn mower tires. My mower weighs at least 500 pounds and this roller is 500 pounds but the surface area in contact with the ground is not 3 feet wide, therefore my lawnmower tires compact the ground more that the lawn roller does. I may put a couple of weights on the frame to make it heaver. It is well constructed though.
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Is this product a prank?
customer_reviews.text: I order Amazon products for work and home. I order thousands of items a year. I have never seen such a product delivered. The drum of this roller, is almost a triangle. It has three different sides flattened. You can see the box in the photo, it survived shipping just fine. This was packaged with three flat sides when it's supposed to be round. I made the effort to fill it up with water to see if it would round itself out by the weight of the water. It didn't work. This product was terrible. I've had a lot of bad products, and plenty of good ones. I've never seen such a terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Durable, works well.
customer_reviews.text: Simple, well-made, easy to use. I have heavy, hard soil, so it is only beneficial to roll after a good rain or heavy watering. It is wonderful how this leveled out the mole tunnels and general unevenness. Seems durable; I have rolled it over big roots and little rocks on the driveway without damage. I drag it behind when I mow, but for best effect you must go at very slow speed.
customer_reviews.author: The Mole

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It's a lawn roller. Assembly was easy, didn't take long. We HAD a significant mole problem and this was a key tool to help find the destructive, spawns of satan. Anyway, rolls the lawn flat, mole tunnels don't have a chance. Definitely meets expectations and it works well with my JD lawn tractor. One item I would recommend is adding some WD40 to the axle bushings. Reduces wear, noise.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Dohm

customer_reviews.title: Be careful!
customer_reviews.text: This roller seems to do the job well; but, the fill hole is too small to keep the hose from popping out and the plug doesn't go in far enough to clear the support arm without extra attention. Could easily pop out and get ripped off. Be careful or it will get damaged. We are using it at new home to help plant grass and wildflower seed and to harden driveway dirt and rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly.  Reliable product.
customer_reviews.text: This product is well designed. The assembly was simple and the only item to check carefully is the friction plug to add water. Make sure it is place ALL THE WAY IN before you flip the tightening level. I have used this to crush the mole tunnels and compacted an area of base and gravel to park an RV. I pull this with a 46 inch Cub Cadet 22hp. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Loyd

customer_reviews.title: Be realistic and do the math
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with high expectations and that maybe the problem. All in all a good product, easy to assemble and use it fast doesn’t produce results. I read review that said the diameter is too small and weight too light. I think they are correct. Product is durable I did loose the plug once but found it and it hasn’t come since. Just temper you expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Chosen_Vessel

customer_reviews.title: Use with water only. It does not roll with sand.
customer_reviews.text: Overall good product. I think this will work better with water. I added sand as was stated in options. The internal traction is more than outside. That's why the roller drags and does not rotate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent for cost.
customer_reviews.text: For the limited weight it will carry when full, it does a decent job. Only complaint is the two players that gold the side bars together near the hitch slip even when very tight. Other than that, for the price it is better to buy this than pay for a lawn to be rolled.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Mad Max
customer_reviews.text: I used two of these to make long range fuel tanks on a full-size Mad Max interceptor replica
customer_reviews.author: CRC

customer_reviews.title: Ordered on Wednesday afternoon, came on Friday morning
customer_reviews.text: Loved that it came when promised, all the parts were there, it was easy to assemble, and used it on Saturday. We have 1 & 1/4-acre yard and deer tear it all to pieces in the winter (we love the deer). Now it's all smooth and wonderful and ready for the grass to grow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly,  Warped Roller
customer_reviews.text: The roller was easy to assemble although finding out the fill plug was missing and realizing the roller was warped area was flat and unusable . Agri-fab needs to consider a metal roller material to lessen the warping .
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Cat Lady

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Design
customer_reviews.text: No instructions - but didn't really matter... the bolts were designed within recesses in the tubing, which prevented easy access to tightening the bolt/nuts... the plate design (for tongue attachment) is probably the worst I have seen... makes no sense why anyone would design a product in that manner,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value and easy (5 minute) assembly.
customer_reviews.text: My neighbor and I split the cost of this and we’re not disappointed. I have used it several times from smoothing out the driveway to leveling sod and tracks from construction vehicles. It takes regular rolling to straighten some things out.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Well built and works very well.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this item. It went together really easy and works very well. I used it to compact grass seed into new topsoil and it did a very good job. It does leak a little water from the fill plug, but not enough to worry about.
customer_reviews.author: Zicc

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed! Missing hardware. The perfect day to roll the lawn ruined by missing parts. Did not enjoy lugging the awkward 50lbs box back to the UPS store. Plus the fact I'm out $35.00 for receiving nothing!
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, works as advertised, and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Putting the roller together had nothing to it really as compared to other items' assembly requirements (e.g. aerator, dethatcher, etc). Hose fits fine as does the attachment for my John Deere E130. After the first use had to adjust the plug by turning its screw a couple of times (as per Liz, customer service phone advice) and it worked fine. Smoothing out my lawn will take time but I'm confident this is the right tool to get it done.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Fradinho

customer_reviews.title: Punctured on first use.
customer_reviews.text: It got punctured and started leaking the very first time I used it. I don’t know how complicated it will be to fill with sand instead but I think that’s the only way it would be useful. I bought it to fix damage from people driving on my lawn but it didn’t seem to make much of a difference.
customer_reviews.author: OBGX54

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: I've used this several time since filling with water. It was easy to assemble and works good to level out small mole tunnels or other high spots. Don't expect this to level your lawn, its just made to flatten loose dirt. It did arrive with a broken/cracked plastic bushing but I put it together with it and its hanging in there. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: Be careful, mine leaked at delivery
customer_reviews.text: Leaked from day of delivery, contacted manufacturer they told me return it to amazon...easier said then done. I had to use putty to try and seal a bad plastic weld from factory
customer_reviews.author: Dennis B.

customer_reviews.title: Portable When Empty.
customer_reviews.text: Found it easy to assemble, and it’s light so one guy can carry it when empty. Works great with ride on mower. Used to depress pebbles in my lawn here in the northeast. Plan to get most effect after spring thaw when the ground is extra soft.
customer_reviews.author: vballmom

customer_reviews.title: Does what it claims - simple assembly too
customer_reviews.text: Works just fine. There wasn't a step by step set of assembly instructions, but rather a parts list which gives a decent overview of what parts go where. I'd think this would not be an issue for most people.
customer_reviews.author: CJH

customer_reviews.title: Good product for money
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good product, I have only used it once. Little hard to understand how to put it together, no worded instructions, only a picture diagram
customer_reviews.author: donniebaker10

customer_reviews.title: This actually works
customer_reviews.text: We put water in this, and towed it behind our lawn mower. It works exactly as described. We had damage from a storm and it worked great. We were able to smooth our driveway and level out torn up sections.
customer_reviews.author: L. Babinsack

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great product, worked out really good in my back yard, had a lot of high and low spots and it helped straighten most of it out.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Mason

customer_reviews.title: Hardware bag ripped
customer_reviews.text: Roller itself seems to be built well. Had I had all of the hardware it would’ve been an easy build, minus the lack of instructions. The bag of hardware was ripped and missing all washers and a few bolts, as well as one of the brackets. I was able to make it work with a piece of steel I had laying around. Other than poor packaging and instructions it’s nice.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Works ok
customer_reviews.text: Works ok, do not leave water in it during the summer if you are not going to use it for a while. Becomes out of round.
customer_reviews.author: javabrk

customer_reviews.title: Roller tank is defective, Agri Fab doesn't stand behind it.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased Agri Fab products before, have been satisfied. After assembly, I noticed small leak near fill hole. When I called Agri Fab, they were aware of problem, said they couldn't replace tank To resolve problem, they said I could use JB weld to try to stop leak, or return entire unit to Amazon. I don't think either option was satisfactory, as they knew there were problems with tank. I won't be purchasing any other Agri Fab products.
customer_reviews.author: louis horn

customer_reviews.title: Leaky issue
customer_reviews.text: The roller I received may have been previously used there was a liquid already inside the drum. The plug for the drum falls out after about 2 minutes of using the roller.
customer_reviews.author: JStar

customer_reviews.title: Filled mine with playsand and I keep it outside hook ...
customer_reviews.text: Filled mine with playsand and I keep it outside hook to my lawn tractor and pull it around 3 or 4 times ayear while I cut the grass keeps the mole runs down too.
customer_reviews.author: braveone

customer_reviews.title: Small parts
customer_reviews.text: Small parts were missing Had to wait for replacement parts Once put together it worked great
customer_reviews.author: Ron Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly. 6 bolts, 4 washer and two bushing. Wasn’t difficult at all. Not sure how long the plastic bushings will last rolling around 400 lbs. We’ll see this spring. Haven’t used it yet.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Recommend a purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product, used it yesterday, and it does quite well. Only reason for four stars was the picture directions. They are a little vague. On the front of the directions is a YouTube video that explains much better than the directions. Other than that a wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what my husband was looking for. He has used several times and is happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne B.

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: When it’s full my lawn tractor couldn’t pull it up a hill. Worked great with my Polaris 400 ATV. Used it to compact mole runs.
customer_reviews.author: constanttraveler

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The hardware is a little flimsy and I have to keep tightening bolts. It still does the job it was meant to do.
customer_reviews.author: dynahd05

customer_reviews.title: company did not provide customer support,as they claimed they would.
customer_reviews.text: During the first use ,the plug that holds water in the drum failed,it would not stay in. I tried to contact the company by e-mail,and got no response......If you are claiming american made,it should be a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: tommy o.

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. Works well. I would avoid rolling over driveways and sidewalks with small rocks as it will scratch the plastic and where it done
customer_reviews.author: Dan Sully

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: It came in with broken pieces but they replaced them immediately. Haven't used it yet. So not sure about the ease of using it. Are truly the durability.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: There is no other options!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not that heavy when empty. But I’m pretty sure my UPS guy hates me. Works good, felt like Dr Doom laughing at my mole tunnels.
customer_reviews.author: cpw

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Works well, pretty heavy with water, went together easily. Check your tow limits on your mower.
customer_reviews.author: Ceece

customer_reviews.title: DOES THE JOB.
customer_reviews.text: husband says does the job, but need to keep eye on bushings.
customer_reviews.author: Spicy

customer_reviews.title: Roll your lawn
customer_reviews.text: Works well and has no trouble handling sticks in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad deal
customer_reviews.text: The plug on this item popped out the first timei used it.....no threads on inner wall to lock plug in place so it will push out....would not reccomend or buy again....
customer_reviews.author: Matt Moreland

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: Put it all together and started putting water in it and it leaked. Called agri fab and said nothing they can do. Now have to disassemble and repack everything to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit leary for the price but was pleasantly surprised how smooth this worked. No edge cuts when turning so the lawn isn't damaged. Also easier to assemble than expected. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They want me to box it up and return it!!! Ridiculous!!!
customer_reviews.text: It lasted all of about 20 minutes before it was leaking with a hole!!
customer_reviews.author: Carlisa

customer_reviews.title: The package arrived somewhat best up but dot they all
customer_reviews.text: This unit came without Hardware. I contacted support and they are sending new hardware. The roller itself looks defective and partially cracked where the fill plug is. It currently holds liquid not sure about durability. The package arrived somewhat best up but dot they all. The cardboard staples where not holding neither did the tape.
customer_reviews.author: MRINuc

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Simple and easy to use. 5 minute assembly and it rolled my yard great. Pretty simple other than that.
customer_reviews.author: Jayson Bates

customer_reviews.title: Lots of paper but no......
customer_reviews.text: You would have gotten 5 stars if you would have included DIRECTIONS! To have to stop and watch an amateur boring, overlong "production" on youtube is a pain!
customer_reviews.author: M L Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, great product.
customer_reviews.text: This turf roller was very easy to assemble. It only took about 10-15minutes to assemble, put it to work right away and had no trouble using it with my zero turn mower. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: When empty very light weight to move around
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this lawn roller three months ago was the first poly propylene roller I bought time will tell and how it holds up to Steel but one things for sure it won’t rust
customer_reviews.author: ray pepper

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great some hardware missing-but I had the hardware on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Franko H

customer_reviews.title: disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Roller arrived fast....was missing the steel trailer frame.... Had to call the manufacturer who will now send the parts out adding a delay . The drum looks ok....disappointed !
customer_reviews.author: Bill Kabbaz

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Mine had a small pin hole that leaked by the water inlet and outlet. I put a torch on it to warm it, smoothed it down and used gorilla glue, good as new. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: MichiganMke

customer_reviews.title: one on the main shaft and had a bad spot on the seam
customer_reviews.text: had 2 spots that leaks. one on the main shaft and had a bad spot on the seam.
customer_reviews.author: howard vaden

customer_reviews.title: ... item has been used several times and is a great asset in flattening lawn areas in need of fllattening
customer_reviews.text: This item has been used several times and is a great asset in flattening lawn areas in need of fllattening.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Z. Scales

customer_reviews.title: Works fine for rolling grass seed in to soil also flattens small bumps
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on my lawn , good for small jobs
customer_reviews.author: Kern K McClure

customer_reviews.title: Good Lawn Roller.
customer_reviews.text: Even with poor directions, this was easy to put together. Tows with no problem behind my 25hp riding lawn mower and the 400+ pounds does a good job on mole tunnels. EZ to fill and empty.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Mann

customer_reviews.title: Great for mole tunnels
customer_reviews.text: It has been working great for mole tunnels. I think you need a bigger one if you are trying to level an older yard.
customer_reviews.author: P in the Rock

customer_reviews.title: Good overall. Mine arrived with a small leak at the fill port.
customer_reviews.text: My drum arrived with a pin hole leak on the ledge where they installed the fill port. A little JB Weld applied to the outside seems to have repaired it.
customer_reviews.author: Driven

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super duper fast shipping and a great product to boot!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Product was used
customer_reviews.text: I must have gotten a product that was used and returned, then sold to me. The thing was dirty and scratched up and damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: A winner!
customer_reviews.text: Very well packaged, easy to assemble. Fills easily and tows well behind garden tractor. Rubber stopper is high-grade.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy Roller
customer_reviews.text: This roller came in a box - but was no trouble to assemble. A couple of bolts and nuts and it was ready to go. It has easy access to the water fill. No problem with hook-up to the tractor/mower. Within 30 minutes I was rolling down the mole hills. Once I finished it was just a matter of opening the drain and letting the water out so I could store it over the winter. The roller is very light-weight so it is no trouble at all to move around when empty.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: When I put it together, I didn't have the plug for it called the manufacturer and they are supposed to send me one
customer_reviews.author: james e macfarland

customer_reviews.title: Great used roller
customer_reviews.text: Got a used one well worth the money my only used product I have gotten and I will look at more used in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie F.

customer_reviews.title: We have lots of Ground Moles in our yard.
customer_reviews.text: He hooks it up to the tractor mower and rolls the ground before he mows. It's a lot easier to mow with the lawn flattened out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble and works as intended. should have gotten a bigger one, but that's my fault.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Its a lawn roller.
customer_reviews.text: This lawn roller leaks badley around the seam around the seam on the end cap!
customer_reviews.author: Donald Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not heavy enough for large areas, but worked fine for my yard
customer_reviews.author: C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: works fantastic and very durable
customer_reviews.text: Husband bought this for our lawn and our son's. works fantastic and very durable. Great price, too.
customer_reviews.author: mary benson

customer_reviews.title: Everything I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed!! Easily put together within 10 minutes and filled with water within another ten minutes. I soaked the yard and pull around about three or four times. I can already tell a difference. For reference I pulled it with a John Deere d130 with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Putman

customer_reviews.title: Looking for drum replacement
customer_reviews.text: Roller had small hole above filler port, they offered to pay for jb weld, and I would fix it. Not what I thought
customer_reviews.author: Ted markham

customer_reviews.title: Waiting for reply
customer_reviews.text: Was missing a pin and a washer and paid for a new product and it was used. Waiting for parts and discount.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: The roller got here fast and was easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The roller got here fast and was easy to assemble. It pulls very well and you can make sharp turns with it. It tracks slightly closer in tight turns so keep an eye obstacles or trees. It did a great job and smoothed out my pasture. It looks great.
customer_reviews.author: michael arns

customer_reviews.title: You don't need a big lawn tractor for this one
customer_reviews.text: My Snapper Series 6 riding mower pulls it with ease filled 2 capacity. Excellent results!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth M. Serino

customer_reviews.title: Cap design is not good.
customer_reviews.text: As reported by other buyers, the cap to the water barrel popped off on the second use and all water emptied.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality roller which was very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: R. J. Silva

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very easy to put together,pulled easy behind my tractor.get value
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Effective and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Assembled easily. Water fill took ten minutes! It rolled easily and was extremely effective behind my John Deere lawn tractor. After a heavy rain I rolled my bumpy recently dug up lawn. The result was immediately observable. I've rolled about three more times and now it is flat enough my son can run and play soccer without hitting ruts and deep depressions. Wish I had bought it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: PETER Z.

customer_reviews.title: Works great, I pull it behind my JD130 with no ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used it 3 times on my new lawn. Works great, I pull it behind my JD130 with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Margo b

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I researched and looked around before buying this lawn roller. Made the correct choice. It is very well built and of high quality. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Lawn Roller
customer_reviews.text: Good price for a quality product easy hook up and does a great job of flattening the grounds around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald L. Burchett

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Lawn Roller
customer_reviews.text: Lawn roller is made in USA, was put together in 15 minutes and was used to press-in seed on a 4 acre pasture. Fast shipping and a high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly J Hettick

customer_reviews.title: not for paving roads mmind you but got rid of some pretty bad bumps in my yard
customer_reviews.text: works really really well, not for paving roads mmind you but got rid of some pretty bad bumps in my yard,,,
customer_reviews.author: Don Mrdjenovic

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly and use
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly and use. It took me a number of runs around the yard to get the desired results, but I blame that more on the yard than the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lawn Roller
customer_reviews.text: I received my order just as I expected. Instead of using water, I filled the lawn roller with sand. It took a lot of sand and afterwoard was rather heavy. It seemed to have worked fine, but the lawn tractor I have to pull the roller was heavier than the roller. It was a good purchase, but I cannot help but think that I should have gotten a roller that was heavier. The size of the roller did not allow a noticable difference in the yard it was purchased to flatten.
customer_reviews.author: dec

customer_reviews.title: Ground roller
customer_reviews.text: It works ok, Especially if the ground is wet, then it works really good
customer_reviews.author: Don D.

customer_reviews.title: Broken drain plug.
customer_reviews.text: Decent product. Drain plug broke during second use. How/where to get a replacement?
customer_reviews.author: jason vasco

customer_reviews.title: WELL WORTH THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased other Agri-Fab implements in the past and have had nothing but good service out of them. My new Roller is no exception. This one was a no brainer to assemble and what's not to like. Very Reasonable price and works like it's suppose to. If you consider renting a lawn roller every time you really should compact/level you would have paid the purchase price off in no time. Even Made in the USA. I like the Agri-Fab Roller would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CRICKER JR

customer_reviews.title: Couldnt find a used one so we bought this one,
customer_reviews.text: This is a real nice roller, easy to put together and just right for our yard, It flattens those mole runs like nothing. I have even loaned it to a couple of the neighbors and they like it to, just the right size for my LT-150 John Deere to pull. very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard T.

customer_reviews.title: Agri-Fab 18-Inch x 36-Inch Poly Tow Lawn Roller
customer_reviews.text: Works fine and was easy to use packing decayed granite on my walkways and drive. Filled with water it is plenty heavy to get the job done and empty it was easy to store out of the sun, therefore preventing damage.
customer_reviews.author: Oso Sam

customer_reviews.title: Lawn Roller
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality product at a fair price. It does exactly what it is supposed to do.... flattens the lawn. Works best after a good rain because the earth is wet and softer. I ordered it on Friday and received it on Monday. Can't get much better service than that.
customer_reviews.author: Riggsvet

product_meta.title: Agri-Fab 18-Inch x 36-Inch Poly Tow Lawn Roller 45-0268,Black
product_meta.description:
Agri-Fab Poly Tow Lawn Rollers are perfect for flattening your yard from the effects of moles, gophers, other yard pests and frost heave in northern climates. The 18 inch by 36 inch roller is constructed of durable, rustproof poly. Fill the drum with water through the easy to operate fill/drain plug to get the force of 400 pounds to flatten the high spots on your lawn. The easy to hook up hitch fits any lawn and garden tractor. The tow tongue incorporates a steel scraper bar to prevent clumps of soil from sticking to the drum.

AMAZON.COM
Restore a lawn’s smooth appearance after flooding or eliminate frost heaves with this heavyweight lawn roller from Agri-Fab. Users fill the roller’s drum with up to 400 pounds of water or sand and hook it up behind a tractor. The tractor tows the roller over lawns and fields, flattening uneven grass or leveling new soil in 36-inch wide swathes. Rolling may also help plant new seeds for uniform growth and eliminate mole holes. 

 The roller’s drum is crafted in a sturdy polyethylene, which resists dents, rust, and weather damage. Powder-baked paint provides further protection. Agri-Fab welded the seams on the drum with rounded edges to prevent any uneven grooves while also providing a leak-proof seal. A brass plug closes the 1-inch filling hole. To remove debris, the roller includes a poly scraper bar. A center baffler provides additional stability to ensure the polyethylene drum does not flex and loose its shape. A hitch pin accompanies the roller to accommodate a trouble-free hook up. The roller is shipped without fill for easy transportation. Users who fill the roller drum with water should drain the drum before winter to ensure the water does not freeze and crack the polyethylene. For user who prefer to fill with sand, Agri-Fab recommends filling the drum only halfway full. To tow the filled roller, a vehicle with a 12 HP engine or greater is required. Towing on hills is highly unadvisable. The roller was manufactured in the USA. A limited one-year warranty may be available for this item. The roller drum spans 36 inches wide with an 18-inch diameter.
feature_bullets: Durable 18" diameter, 36" wide, no rust, internally reinforced, poly roller drum
400 lbs weight with water to help flatten uneven grass and level new soil in 36" wide swaths
Less than 50 lbs without water for easy storage and transport and roller drain/fill plug empties easily and fills with a regular garden hose
Includes removable drain plug and poly scraper bar; center baffler provides additional stability
3 Year Limited Consumer Warranty; Made in USA with some imported components
